attachments.name: Step Passed: Send a search request with GET method with valid NHS Number '9728403348' and valid Disease Type 'COVID' and Date From '2025-05-12' and Date To '2025-05-12' and include 'abc'
Step Passed: The request will be unsuccessful with the status code '400'
Step Passed: The Search Response JSONs should contain correct error message for invalid Date From, Date To and include
